text: Siphonops leucoderus, also known as the Salvador caecilian, is a species of Caecilians. They belong to the family Caeciliidae. They live in Brazil. Their habitat are subtropical or tropical forests. They like to live in lowland forests and rural areas. ==References== * Silvano, D.& Pimenta, B. 2004. Siphonops leucoderus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 July 2007. Category:Caecilians
title: Siphonops leucoderus
